question:
[Dannielle] was excited because today she was going to the zoo with her uncle [Joseph]. [Ethel] was excited because she was meeting her father, [Timothy], for lunch. [Judy] takes her daughter [Alice] to kindergarten in the mornings. [Judy]'s husband [Joseph] takes his son [Gerald] to the bus stop. [Alice] went over to her uncle [William]'s house for dinner. [Dannielle] and [Oscar] left that evening to go bowling. [Janice] and her father [Timothy] were attempting to coax her son [Oscar] from out of a tall tree.
Question: How is [William] related to [Ethel]?
